summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Alley in Block 16, Mt. Baker Park Addition, being the Alley between Mt. Baker Boulevard and Hanford Street and extending from Mt. Parker Circle to 33rd Avenue South; all in The City of Seattle, all in accordance with Resolution No. 7131 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds", and declaring an emergency.
